official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any individual who serves as the Director of the Energy Policy Office should be appointed by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any individual who serves as the Director of the Energy Policy Office should be appointed by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
